title: Look Love Me Dear Song Lyrics Simla Special
stanzas: <div>Look Love Me Dear Song Lyrics Simla Special

look love me dear,
lovely figure, lasting colour,
venmaegamae odivaa

thaenkonda poovae thaedi vaa
naan konja vaendum naadi vaa

kaadhal ennangal
neeradum oadai.
kanni poomaeni
kan kaattum jaadai (2)

koondal mael nindru
oonjal pol indru
kaatru vilayadum
naal allavo

oh ! love me dear
leave me never
hold me ever
venmaegamae odivaa

vaanam thaen sindhu
yaavum naan thandhu
neeyum kaviyaagum
pozhuthallavo

o look love me dear,
lovely figure, lasting colour,
venmaegamae odivaa

thaenkonda poovae thaedi vaa
naan konja vaendum naadi vaa
